siteMetadata.title: Lucas Brandstaetter | IT/OT Security Export
siteMetadata.about: I'm a seasoned IT/OT security expert with 7 years in the field. My days are dedicated to fortifying industrial landscapes. When off-duty, I code for open source projects, go out for rides on my bike and find creative escape in my camera.
